scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a sensitive customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker uses carefully crafted queries to the model's prediction API, inferring internal model parameters and potentially sensitive customer data.
initial_goal: Analyze the performance and characteristics of the credit scoring model.
constraints: query_data_restriction: No personally identifiable information (PII) in input features
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: Credit risk assessment department
